Text: Oñ abu kʼa mufu tane̩ e̩gbale̩ tak a ma ka ku ma do̩ ala le̩ ko̩ Me̩lita.
Tak eche̩do̩ kʼamakagudo̩gudo̩ o̩mo̩ che̩do̩ wa i chʼibe̩te̩ n; todu ma fʼuna ko, oñ ma mʼo̩chaka-wa gbanyi, tod omi ki alo̩ kpʼafu ki akpa.
Oñ abu ku Po̩l mʼotiji ya jo̩ kʼi ako nyʼuna, olijoʼka kwʼef uwñ tod una ki kpa nyʼo̩la oñ i kwomanyʼo̩wo̩-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼamakagudo̩gudo̩ le̩ li e̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ abu kʼi lo̩ko̩li o̩wo̩-wñ, ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, I chʼomune̩ n, akpone̩ e̩ne̩-i che, dagba ma fu jadu kwʼef ohimini, o̩kpakpa aje̩ ñw u adeju n.
Tak i fʼe̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ miejo tef una, i la chʼo e̩bie̩ne̩ du n.
Ama ma jʼaneju e̩gba kʼi awu abe̩k i aleane̩ achigili kʼi aku, ama abu ku ma jʼaneju gbogbogbo ku ma li kʼe̩wñ du ma chʼo n, ma mʼalu-ma rida oñ ma ka kʼo̩jo̩ʼka de̩.
Ame̩ru o̩wo̩ o̩mo̩ le̩ ane̩ uche̩ e̩nuto̩gba ala le̩ de̩, odu e̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ Publius; i mʼuwa gba ru unyi-wñ ache̩-do̩ wa o̩jo̩ me̩ta.
Oñ abe̩le̩, ata Publius dachi, afu kpʼatini mʼowñ ne̩ gaga. Po̩l mugudu nyʼugbo-wñ, oñ i fʼadua che oñ i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ du nʼo, i fʼo̩ga-wñ che kpa.
Tak abu kʼe-le̩ wache, abo ku ma nʼe̩gbo o̩la kibo̩ ef ala le̩ lewa, oñ i fʼo̩ga-ma che.
Abo le̩ ño̩ bumo̩ wa nana tak e̩gba kʼa tʼo̩ko̩ alo ma mʼe̩wñ kʼeku-wñ aku wa ko ñw a.
Oñ abu kʼochu-wñ jo̩ e̩ta, a kwotʼo̩ko̩ e-Ale̩kisandria e-kʼi jʼo̩jo̩ uwo ugbo ala le̩, e̩wñ ujiwe o̩ko̩ le̩ che Ukpejima.
Tak abu kʼe-le̩ mʼuwa ko wa Sarakius a gugu o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta.
Akwʼo̩mo̩ a dagbala wa Re̩ge̩um; oñ a fʼoluʼka le̩, tak afu chane̩ eju kwʼo̩pata o̩gane̩, oñ o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ a lewa Puteoli.
Oñ abu kʼa fʼamo̩maye li o̩mo̩, ma rodubʼuwa kʼa bʼuma gugu o̩jo̩ mebie. Abe̩le̩ tak a lewa Rom.
Abu kʼamo̩maye le̩ gbʼinabali-wa ma kwʼo̩mo̩ ledo wa gbogbo wa Aja Apius, kpʼUto̩je̩ Me̩ta; abu ku Po̩l fejudo ma, i fʼO̩jo̩ gwa, oñ i fʼe̩do̩ ne̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼa mugudu tef ewo Rom agboji amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ je̩ ñw Po̩l kʼi gugu e-wñ ojoji kpʼisoja kʼi adide owñ.

Oñ i leatu e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta jo̩ i fʼabo ku ma chʼamuto̩gba ef amaJu do̩ wa jʼugboʼkate; oñ abu ku ma lewa jo̩ i ka ñw ma kakini, Amo̩maye-mi aboke̩le̩, abu kʼomi ma chaka chʼe̩wñ du agwunyʼamone̩-wa kpʼe̩wñ o̩gu amata-wa n, oj agba u de̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m oñ ma dʼumi ñw abo Rom.
Abo le̩ fʼili ajo-mi gwa, ma la neku etʼumi no̩, todabu kʼe̩wñ du kʼu che ku ma du mi kpa ma dʼef umi n.
Ama abu kʼamaJu mʼubi dagbʼe-le̩, i mud otila ñw mi kʼu chʼapili nyʼo̩gba Sisa; i cheka kʼomi nʼe̩wñ kʼu nagwajo̩ nʼabo ichi-mi n.
Todule̩ e̩te̩ udo̩ kʼu do̩ me̩ chʼutodu kʼu li eju-me̩ kʼu ko̩la ñw me̩. Todu e̩wñ ukibeno e-abo Israe̩l oñ igbaligba kide̩ wenyʼumi-i.
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Awa la gbʼo̩takada o̩la-we̩ kwo Judia n, e̩ne̩ du ef amo̩maye le̩ la wa ka ñw a n, ma la ko̩la e̩wñ bibi du nyʼe̩ n.
I la nyo̩ wa eju kʼa gbo̩ ibe e̩wñ kʼi dʼef uwe̩ alu-we̩, todu i chʼe-o̩la uche̩ ki date̩-i, a chema ka ku ma mʼubi dagbʼo ugbo du.

Oñ abu ku ma fʼo̩jo̩ da ñw u amone̩ ño̩ wa ef uru ugbo-wñ tule. I fʼo̩la le̩ kajane̩ ñw ma, i gba ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ibenu nyo̩nyo̩, i nʼo̩lo̩da Mose̩s kpʼamakache̩ tʼuma eju gu ugbo e̩wñ Jisus kwʼodudu gbogbo wʼane̩.
Abo iche̩kibo̩ la dʼo̩la kʼi ka le̩ rʼochochi, iche̩ka la ko̩ eke̩do̩nʼo.
Oñ abu kʼibe-ma chʼojoji kpʼo̩la-ma ma kwʼo̩mo̩ le, abu ku Po̩l fʼo̩laʼka ka: i kakini, Afu Kiafo̩ fʼo̩la o̩me̩me̩le̩ ka lef Aizaya akache̩ ñw amata-me̩ kakini,
E̩ nalo tʼugbo amone̩ kide̩ kʼe̩ ka kakini,
Todu e̩do̩ amone̩-i mud e̩do̩ agbo̩go̩,
Todule̩ ame̩ ki ma ka ku ma fʼujadu O̩jo̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo abo uche̩ichi me̩; ama la agbo.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ kide̩ ka amaJu kwʼo̩mo̩ le ma, ma nʼiñwa nana aje̩ kpʼo̩la-ma.]
Po̩l la gugu ef unyi kʼowñ onugo faya le̩ o̩do̩ meji odukulu, i la yo̩ ñw abo du ku ma wʼugbo-wñ,
i la nʼakoya ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ata, i la nʼeju e̩gbo kʼone̩ o̩la e̩wñ du ki jʼugbo Ondu Jisusi Kraist, e̩ne̩ du la fʼu naba n.
